thread.title: John Hurt Has Passed Away At 77
thread.title_full: John Hurt Has Passed Away At 77 | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: John Hurt Has Passed Away At 77
text:
He will be missed.
On Friday, John Hurt — who played Mr. Ollivander in the Harry Potter franchise — has reportedly passed away at 77. He was diagnosed with pancreatic cancer in 2015. 
Related: Stars We Lost In 2016 
Hurt has been nominated for an Academy Award twice — for The Elephant Man and Midnight Express .
Three years ago, the thespian was knighted by Queen Elizabeth II . He is survived by his wife Anwen Rees-Myer .
Recently, he starred opposite Natalie Portman in Jackie .
R.I.P. John.
[ Image via WENN . ] 
Tags: film flickers , harry potter , natalie portman , oscars , r.i.p. , sad sad
